posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: September 17, 2013 at 7:06 AM#2unfortunately "Learn" is not possible to use from a macro.the Learn command needs to be processed as a real-time action to be able to measure the time and calculate a speed

posts.author: woodforth

posts.author: Givskov
posts.post_text: June 4, 2014 at 10:14 PM#4Hey Woodforthit might be a bit late, but I was fidling with the same macro just today, and by chance came by your question this evening. Here´s the macros for Learn, HS and DS for speed group 1 -  Works with 2.9.1.1Learn SpecialMaster 3.1DoubleSpeed SpecialMaster 3.1HalfSpeed SpecialMaster 3.1If you want the macro to relate to speed group 2 just type 3.2 (and so forth)

title: macro speed learn
